description: Bitcoin Elliott Wave analysis covering short- and medium-term market structure.

updates.title: Short-term wave count suggests pullback to 61.8%
updates.summary: BTC is likely completing a corrective Wave 4 before the next impulsive advance.
body: Bitcoin has completed a strong impulsive advance and is now showing signs of corrective behavior.
Lower timeframe momentum divergence and overlapping price action support a Wave 4 correction scenario.
As long as price holds above the 48k region, the higher timeframe bullish structure remains intact.

scenarios.label: Primary Scenario
scenarios.text: Wave 4 retraces into the 48k–51k Fibonacci support zone before continuation.

scenarios.label: Alternative Scenario
scenarios.text: Shallow consolidation followed by a breakout above 56k invalidates the deeper correction.

updates.title: second test (test puorpos)
